Hide The Corpse - Early Access v1 - Patch #1
===============

Added:
- Implemented player analytics
- Added a particles effect to the door explosion at the end of the level timer

Modified:
- Improved the objects selection algorithm during the police investigation scene at the end of a level
- Improved the walkie-talkie model

Fixed:
- Fixed the player's position during the police investigation scene at the end of a level
- Fixed the tutorial level's flow
- Fixed the menu items behaviour when hovering a menu item with both hand lasers
- Fixed various visual bugs during the police investigation scene at the end of a level
- Fixed the cropped ground displayed with the level and menu doors at the end of a level
